column2: It looks like her machine worked!
It's going for me to completlely feel the energy of Cion, but I can already feel a tiny bit flowing through my body.
Now, I still don't know if everything's okay, but I'm fine, so that must mean that at least other beings are, and that's what matters. We can repair any environmental damages.
However, we should put Sal in a security facility for now.
Just a little bit overwhelmed, is all.
It's not easy accepting Sal for what she was really trying to do.
Uhhhh, I might need a hand.
